name: taskie
description: Taskie is a powerful task tracking application that allows you to not only create and track various tasks, but also automate task creation based on real-world factors such as weather! Complete with categories, tasks, and subtasks, its easy to keep track of everything that you need to complete in a day. Invite a friend or spouse to join your task list. Combine this with our powerful smart features like weather-based tasks and you'll never forget to cover the cushions before a rainy day again!
